#summary &xharr; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesX X] > &xharr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&xhArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27fa/index.htm U+027FA].
  * `&xharr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f7/index.htm U+027F7].
